job.title: Software Integration Engineer
job.description: We are looking for a Software Integration Engineer in the Houston, TX area. This is a full time position onsite that includes great benefits including health, dental, vision, 401K, PTO and an annual bonus.This position will be working with the backend of several applications including the ServiceNow platform. As a Software Integration Engineer, your main responsibilities consists of communicating with various departments and understanding what needs to be done in developing solutions for various enterprise software systems.Technical Requirements:Software development background in .NETContainerization experience with Docker and KubernetesExperience developing applications in high availability clusters getting to ensure that they are cloud readyExperience integrating various applications with the ServiceNow platformAutomation experience with Ansible and TerraformExperience communicating with users to gather their requirements
